ComicInfo.Summary: The "Super Duper Comic Con" is in town and The Tick and Arthur are invited guests to this gala event! But it's The Tick who is swamped by scores of fans and TV producers while Arthur gets ignored as "just a sidekick." The Tick even meets the wrestler-turned-actor named 'The Gun Show' who has been chosen to portray him on a Tick TV series! With all of this attention directed towards The Tick, his envious super-hero friends - including even Arthur - contemplate expelling him from their super-team! Is it possible that Arthur also been bitten by the green-eyed-monster and has turned on The Tick? Could this be the beginning of a TV series for "The Tick" but the end for the duo known as "The Tick and Arthur?"
